MERGE [Permissions] USING (
VALUES (@p25, @p26, @p27, @p28, @p29, @p30, 0),
(@p31, @p32, @p33, @p34, @p35, @p36, 1),

(@p151, @p152, @p153, @p154, @p155, @p156, 21),
(@p157, @p158, @p159, @p160, @p161, @p162, 22),
(@p163, @p164, @p165, @p166, @p167, @p168, 23),
(@p169, @p170, @p171, @p172, @p173, @p174, 24)) AS i ([CanCreate], [CanDelete], [CanRead], [CanUpdate], [FunctionId], [RoleId], _Position) ON 1=0
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
INSERT ([CanCreate], [CanDelete], [CanRead], [CanUpdate], [FunctionId], [RoleId])
VALUES (i.[CanCreate], i.[CanDelete], i.[CanRead], i.[CanUpdate], i.[FunctionId], i.[RoleId])
OUTPUT INSERTED.[Id], i._Position
INTO @inserted25;

SELECT [t].[Id] FROM [Permissions] t
INNER JOIN @inserted25 i ON ([t].[Id] = [i].[Id])
ORDER BY [i].[_Position];" (0723d8ff)

    THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT)
END AS [CanRead], CASE
    WHEN [p].[Id] IS NOT NULL AND ([p].[CanUpdate] = 1)
    THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT)
END AS [CanUpdate]
FROM [Functions] AS [f]
LEFT JOIN [Permissions] AS [p] ON [f].[Id] = [p].[FunctionId]
WHERE [p].[Id] IS NOT NULL AND ([p].[RoleId] = @__roleId_0)" (0723d8ff)

END AS [CanCreate], CASE
    WHEN [p].[Id] IS NOT NULL AND ([p].[CanDelete] = 1)
    THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT)
END AS [CanDelete], CASE

    THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT)

        WHERE ([r].[Name] IN (N'Admin', N'Staff', N'Customer') AND ([f].[Id] = @__functionId_1)) AND ([p].[CanDelete] = 1))
    THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT)
END" (0723d8ff)

    THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT)
END, [x.Product.ProductCategory].[Id] AS [Id0], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[Name] AS [Name0], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[Description] AS [Description0], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[ParentId], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[HomeOrder], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[Image] AS [Image0], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[HomeFlag] AS [HomeFlag0], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[DateCreated], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[DateModified], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[SortOrder], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[Status], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[SeoPageTitle], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[SeoAlias], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[SeoKeywords], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[SeoDescription], [x.Product].[SeoPageTitle] AS [SeoPageTitle0], [x.Product].[SeoAlias] AS [SeoAlias0], [x.Product].[SeoKeywords] AS [SeoKeywords0], [x.Product].[SeoDescription] AS [SeoDescription0], [x.Product].[DateCreated] AS [DateCreated0], [x.Product].[DateModified] AS [DateModified0], [x.Product].[Status] AS [Status0], [x].[Path], [x].[Caption]

2018-02-04T22:30:21.8170087+07:00 0HLBBSAP067K6:00000006 [INF] Executed DbCommand ("5"ms) [Parameters=["@__p_0='?', @__p_1='?'"], CommandType='Text', CommandTimeout='30']"
""SELECT [x].[Id] AS [Id1], [x].[Name], [x].[CategoryId] AS [Id0], [x].[Image], [x].[Price], [x].[PromotionPrice], [x].[OriginalPrice], [x].[Description], [x].[Content], [x].[HomeFlag], [x].[HotFlag], [x].[ViewCount], [x].[Tags], [x].[Unit], CASE
    WHEN [x].[CategoryId] IS NOT NULL
    THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT)
END, [x.ProductCategory].[Name] AS [Name0], [x.ProductCategory].[Description] AS [Description0], [x.ProductCategory].[ParentId], [x.ProductCategory].[HomeOrder], [x.ProductCategory].[Image] AS [Image0], [x.ProductCategory].[HomeFlag] AS [HomeFlag0], [x.ProductCategory].[DateCreated], [x.ProductCategory].[DateModified], [x.ProductCategory].[SortOrder], [x.ProductCategory].[Status], [x.ProductCategory].[SeoPageTitle], [x.ProductCategory].[SeoAlias], [x.ProductCategory].[SeoKeywords], [x.ProductCategory].[SeoDescription], [x.ProductCategory].[Id], [x].[SeoPageTitle] AS [SeoPageTitle0], [x].[SeoAlias] AS [SeoAlias0], [x].[SeoKeywords] AS [SeoKeywords0], [x].[SeoDescription] AS [SeoDescription0], [x].[DateCreated] AS [DateCreated0], [x].[DateModified] AS [DateModified0], [x].[Status] AS [Status0]
FROM [Products] AS [x]

    THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT)
END, [x.Product].[Name], [x.Product].[CategoryId], [x.Product].[Image], [x.Product].[Price], [x.Product].[PromotionPrice], [x.Product].[OriginalPrice], [x.Product].[Description], [x.Product].[Content], [x.Product].[HomeFlag], [x.Product].[HotFlag], [x.Product].[ViewCount], [x.Product].[Tags], [x.Product].[Unit], CASE
    WHEN [x.Product].[CategoryId] IS NOT NULL
    THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT)
END, [x.Product.ProductCategory].[Id] AS [Id0], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[Name] AS [Name0], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[Description] AS [Description0], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[ParentId], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[HomeOrder], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[Image] AS [Image0], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[HomeFlag] AS [HomeFlag0], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[DateCreated], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[DateModified], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[SortOrder], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[Status], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[SeoPageTitle], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[SeoAlias], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[SeoKeywords], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[SeoDescription], [x.Product].[SeoPageTitle] AS [SeoPageTitle0], [x.Product].[SeoAlias] AS [SeoAlias0], [x.Product].[SeoKeywords] AS [SeoKeywords0], [x.Product].[SeoDescription] AS [SeoDescription0], [x.Product].[DateCreated] AS [DateCreated0], [x.Product].[DateModified] AS [DateModified0], [x.Product].[Status] AS [Status0], [x].[Path], [x].[Caption]

INNER JOIN [Products] AS [x.Product] ON [x].[ProductId] = [x.Product].[Id]
